title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: Ian McQue
raw_text: Cover Art  Retro    Ian McQue works in videogame development at Rockstar North as assistant art director and concept artist. He has been part of the teams behind the acclaimed Grand Theft Auto series, Manhunt, Bully, and more. His personal work has been published widely, from Imagine FX magazine to books from Design Studio Press. In conjunction with Industria Mechanika he also designs model kits.
text:
Cover Art
Retro
Ian McQue works in videogame development at Rockstar North as assistant art director and concept artist. He has been part of the teams behind the acclaimed Grand Theft Auto series, Manhunt, Bully, and more. His personal work has been published widely, from Imagine FX magazine to books from Design Studio Press. In conjunction with Industria Mechanika he also designs model kits.
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Retro by Ian McQue
